text: The 2014 Indonesian Dangdut Awards was the first music award show presented by Indosiar television station and was televised live on Indosiar. The awards was held on June 11, 2014, at the Teater Tanah Airku, Taman Mini Indonesia Indah, East Jakarta, and was hosted by Indonesian presenters Ramzi, Rina Nose, Irfan Hakim, and Ivan Gunawan. The awards ceremonies will held theme for "Dangdut Untuk Semua". Nurbayan led the nominations with four categories and get two awards. == Performers == {| class="wikitable" |- !Artist(s) !Song(s) |- |Krisdayanti |"Penasaran" |- |Judika |"Judi" |- |Krisdayanti Judika |"Oplosan" |- |Rita Sugiarto |"Biarlah Merana" |- |Inul Daratista |"Masa Lalu" |- |Zaskia Gotik |"1 Jam Saja" |- |Iis Dahlia |"Jomblo Senior" |- |Elsa Lidya Risma Rasya 2N |"Bang Jali" "E Mas Buloh" |- |Julia Perez |"Aku Rapopo" |- |Glenn Frans Ari Jamil Putra |"Senyum Membawa Luka" |- |Lesti Andryani Subro |"Kerinduan" |- |Fida Eva |"Cindai" |- |Nur Aty Judika |"Laksmana Raja Di Laut" |- |Bahar Family |"Buka Dikit Joss" |- |Ikif Fikar |"Pokoke Joged" |- |Uut Permatasari |"Putri Panggung" |- |Iceu Wong |"Pacar Lima Langkah" |- |Fitri Carlina |"ABG Tua" |- |Siti Badriah |"Berondong Tua" |- |Didi Kempot |"Stasiun Balapan" |- |Rina Nose Irfan Hakim Ramzi Ivan Gunawan Saipul Jamil |"Hayang Kawin" |- |Febro Tutha Dona |"Resesi Dunia" |- |Lesti Andryani Nur Aty Edfrans Angga |"Keagungan Tuhan" |- |Iis Dahlia Edfrans Angga |"Cuma Kamu" |- |D'Academy All Artists |"Kopi Dangdut" |} == Presenters == * Siti Badriah and Zaskia Gotik — Presented Most Popular Newcomer * Mansyur Subhawannur and Hamdan ATT — Presented Most Popular Solo Female Dangdut Singer * Kristina and Uut Permatasari — Presented Most Popular Solo Male Dangdut Singer * Ivan Gunawan, Beniqno, and Saipul Jamil — Presented Most Popular Group/Duo Dangdut * Ikif Khawazima and Inul Daratista — Presented Most Popular Dangdut Shake * Muchsin Alatas and Julia Perez — Presented Most Popular Dangdut Songwriters * Rina Nose and Didi Kempot — Presented Most Popular Local Language Dangdut Songs * Fitri Carlina — Introduced Lesti Andryani * Rita Sugiarto and Titiek Puspa — Introduced Dangdut Shareing * Judika and Iis Dahlia — Presented Most Popular Dangdut Song == Winners & nominees == The nominees were announced on May 24, 2016. Winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface. {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%" |- ! style="text-align:center; background:#EEDD85; width:50%"| Most Popular Solo Male Dangdut Singer ! style="text-align:center; background:#EEDD85; width:50%"| Most Popular Solo Female Dangdut Singer |- | valign="top" | * Saipul Jamil ** Beniqno ** Agung Hercules ** Nassar ** Ridho Rhoma | valign="top" | * Inul Daratista ** Fitri Carlina ** Siti Badriah ** Ayu Ting Ting ** Zaskia Gotik |- ! style="text-align:center; background:#EEDD85; width:50%"| Most Popular Newcomer Singer ! style="text-align:center; background:#EEDD85; width:50%"| Most Popular Group/Duo Dangdut |- | valign="top" | * Jenita Janet ** Hesty Klepek Klepek ** Nurbayan ** Wiwik Sagita ** Wika Salim | valign="top" | * Trio Macan ** 2 Unyu Unyu ** Duo Anggrek ** 2 Racun Youbi Sister ** Trio Ubur Ubur |- ! style="text- align:center; background:#EEDD85; width:50%"| Most Popular Dangdut Song ! style="text-align:center; background:#EEDD85; width:50%"| Most Popular Local Language Dangdut Songs |- | valign="top" | * "Buka Sikit Joss" - Juwita Bahar (songwriters Krisna Purna) ** "Bara Bere" - Siti Badriah (songwriters Endang Raes) ** "Buaya Buntung" - Inul Daratista (songwriters Kabul Kajate/Yoni Dores) ** "Cukup 1 Menit" - Zaskia Gotik (songwriters Aldo Aprizo) ** "Oplosan" - Nurbayan (songwriters Nurbayan) | valign="top" | * "Oplosan" - Nurbayan (songwriters Nurbayan) ** "Ngamen 5" - Eny Sagita (songwriters Eny Sagita) ** "Ning Nang Ning Gung" - Genk Kobra (songwriters Solikhin Gundul Pati) ** "Wedi Karo Bojomu" - Faried D. S. (songwriters Faried D. S.) ** "Pokoke Joget" - Nurbayan (songwriters Nurbayan) |- ! style="text- align:center; background:#EEDD85; width:50%"| Most Popular Dangdut Shake ! style="text-align:center; background:#EEDD85; width:50%"| Most Popular Dangdut Songwriters |- | valign="top" | * Itik Shake - Zaskia Gotik ** Bang Jali Shake - Denny Cagur ** Dada Mentok Shake - Duo Anggrek ** Gibrig Shake - Fitri Carlina ** Pinguin Shake - Duo Walang Sangit | valign="top" | * Nurbayan - "Oplosan" (singer by Nurbayan) ** Aldo Aprizo - "Cukup 1 Menit" (singer by Zaskia Gotik) ** Endang Raes - "Bara Bere" (singer by Siti Badriah) ** Kabul Kajate or Yoni Dores - "Buaya Buntung" (singer by Inul Daratista) ** Krisna Purna - "Buka Sitik Joss" (singer by Juwita Bahar) |} === Other === {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%" |- ! style="text-align:center; background:#EEDD85; width:50%"| Dangdut Shareing |- | valign="top" | * Mara Karma * Ellya Khadam * Munif bahasuan * Denny Albar * Ida Laila |} ==References== Category:Indonesian television awards Category:Indonesian music awards Category:2014 music awards Category:Indosiar
title: 2014 Indonesian Dangdut Awards
